meanings.sent1: The unspecialized tool could be used for many different tasks.
meanings.sent2: The unspecialized approach allowed for flexibility in the project.
meanings.sent3: The unspecialized paintbrush tried to paint a straight line but ended up zigzagging.
meanings.sent4: Her unspecialized knowledge of gardening was like a blank canvas waiting to be filled.
meanings.sent5: The unspecialized software was user-friendly for beginners.

meanings.sent1: The unspecialized employee was able to help out in various departments.
meanings.sent2: His unspecialized training made him a versatile candidate for the job.
meanings.sent3: The unspecialized chef attempted to bake a cake but ended up with a lopsided creation.
meanings.sent4: Her unspecialized resume was a mix of different experiences, making her unique.
meanings.sent5: The unspecialized student was eager to learn about different subjects.
